questions.question: What is the predominant color of the lamp's body and shade?
What is the overall shape of the lampshade, viewed from above?
Describe the texture of the lamp's metallic surfaces?
What is the material most visibly comprising the lamp's structure?
What is the shape of the lamp's base, viewed from the side?
What color is the visible electrical cord extending from the base?
Considering the lamp's design, what style best describes it?
What is the apparent finish of the metal components of the lamp?
What is the shape of the central supporting column of the lamp?
Is there any visible pattern or ornamentation on the lamp's surfaces?
Describe the relative thickness of the lampshade compared to the base?
What type of light source does the lamp appear designed to accommodate?
Is the lampshade completely opaque or does it allow any light diffusion?
What is the overall height of the lamp relative to its width?
Does the base appear to be weighted or stable for its size and design?
